title: Enchanting Historic Villa With Modern Comfort By Leszno’s Waterfront
description: Step into timeless elegance with this spacious, restored early 20th-century villa that seamlessly blends historic charm with cutting-edge convenience. Offering six naturally lit bedrooms spread across 260 sqm, this stately home also features two contemporary bathrooms, exquisite hardwood floors, and soundproof walls for a tranquil living experience. Modern upgrades include a heated driveway and a discreet reception area, supporting flexible live/work arrangements. The elegant interior radiates character through original fixtures juxtaposed with functional touches to suit today’s digital lifestyle.
neighborhood_description: Nestled in the distinguished Zatorze neighborhood, this home situates you moments from Leszno’s tranquil waterfront, beckoning bike rides and peaceful strolls alike. Renowned for its quiet, residential atmosphere, the area boasts excellent access to public transport and the nearby highway, simplifying both local commutes and longer journeys. Families and professionals alike will relish proximity to well-regarded schools and bike-friendly routes.
lifestyle_benefits: tranquil setting for focused remote work
quick escapes to waterfront green spaces
ideal for digital nomads choosing a historic yet modern base
easy access to co-working and digital infrastructure nearby
target_buyer: Remote-working digital nomads and professionals seeking a prestigious, inspiring home where tradition meets modern connectivity; also ideal for large families desiring ample private space and charm.
market_positioning: A rare integration of Leszno’s historic architectural heritage and tailored conveniences for remote workers, this singular villa appeals to discerning buyers valuing character, comfort, and an inspiring ambiance above mere new-build basics.
